title: Collin Morikawa, BS 19, wins PGA Championship
author: Natasha Payes
excerpt:
Collin Morikawa, BS 19, stunned the golf world Sunday, making history as one of the youngest PGA Golf Championship winners.  With the 2020 championship win, the Berkeley Haas alum joins an elite group of golfers, including Tiger Woods, Rory McIllory, and Jack Nicklaus, who all won the PGA Championship at age 23.  Morikawa, who held […]
The post Collin Morikawa, BS 19, wins PGA Championship appeared first on Haas News | Berkeley Haas.
